title: Fiery BBQ Sauce
ingredients: ['475ml apple cider', '125ml balsamic vinegar', '300g ketchup', '175g honey mustard', '125g yellow mustard', '125g wholegrain mustard', '5 tablespoons honey', '5 tablespoons treacle', '75ml cane syrup', '340ml dark beer', '125ml brewed coffee', '125ml Worcestershire sauce', '125ml soy sauce', '125ml hot pepper sauce', '1 teaspoon ground black pepper', '1 teaspoon celery salt', '1 habanero chilli pepper, seeded and finely chopped']
